Package org.bohdansharubin

Class ClothesFactory

java.lang.Object
org.bohdansharubin.ClothesFactory
public class ClothesFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating Clothes objects via console input.

This class handles user interaction, input validation, and ensures that a valid Clothes object is created before returning it.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Clothes
    createClothes(Scanner input, ClothesType clothesType)
    Prompts the user to enter clothing attributes and creates a valid Clothes object.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • createClothes

      public static Clothes createClothes(Scanner input, ClothesType clothesType)
      Prompts the user to enter clothing attributes and creates a valid Clothes object.

      The method keeps asking for input until all values are valid. It handles:

      • InputMismatchException – when numeric input is invalid
      • IllegalArgumentException – when validation fails in Clothes
      Parameters:
      clothesType - is which type of object method needs to be created
      Returns:
      a valid Clothes object based on user input
